line.title: Link/Schema: Link & schema hygiene (lint, anchors, metadata).
Lead Time: Responsiveness (lower lead time ⇒ higher score).

svg.text: • A living radar of CoCivium repo health across 8 axes (0–1).
• Rings = evolution stages 1–9; dashed ring hints at ∞ (beyond roadmap).
• Polygon = current progress; farther out = healthier. Values shown as %.
• Starpoints = key concepts/files; trails = recent velocity.
• Edge dents = Redundancy Debt per axis (duplicates/conflicts).
• Data source: admin/metrics/metrics.json (updated nightly via GitHub Action).
